title: Recommended iron pill reading (short edition) in epub v1.1
description:
Changes from v1.0:
-added Archeofuturism by Guillaume Faye

image of subdirectories here: http://image.bayimg.com/42ff67390e7674d49e29704b7d73e4c50b7d22d6.jpg

original image here: http://image.bayimg.com/a29f234c19578fcb3af55e6aeed246fef33f3fdc.jpg

All in epub format except for Evola's Ride the Tiger (which doesn't seem to exist in any ebook format), either originally epub, or converted from azw3/mobi/another good ebook format. 

I was only able to find 83% of the books. If you have any of the two I couldn't find, I would really appreciate you getting it to me (via a comment to this torrent or something).
